Chapter 6 Descriptive Evidence LFS_Indicators_Y <- readRDS("C:/Users/ali/Dropbox/LFS Cleaning/GitHub/R Codes/Consistency/LFS_Indicators_Y.RDS") LFSINP <- function(Var, xlab = "", ylab = "", Main = "") { p <- ggplot(data = LFS_Indicators_Y,mapping = aes(x=Year,y=eval(parse(text =Var ))/1000000))+ geom_point(color = "Red",shape = 17)+ geom_line()+ labs(title = Main,x=xlab,y=ylab) return(p) } 6.1 Employment 6.2 Unemployment 6.3 Participation
